Description:
BIRT help content cannot display.

Build number:2.2.0.v20070130 and BIRT 2.2.0M4 build

1. Open Eclipse with BIRT.
2. See Main menu Help->Help Contents->BIRT related help document.

Expected result:
All BIRT help document can be viewed.

The link error inside "BIRT Programmer Reference" is build bug, I have submitted another bug #173387 for it.
Please fix the issue inside "BIRT Report Developer Guide"

It works fine in BIRT 2.1 series which combined with Eclipse 3.2, so i think maybe Eclipse 3.3 changed the Help component implementation. Maybe the topic content must be valid XML format in Eclipse 3.3 for it threw SAXParseException, and i found there are invalid comments in the content htm file. Just a guess.

The link error inside "BIRT Programmer Reference" is build bug, I have submitted another bug #173387 for it.
Please fix the issue inside "BIRT Report Developer Guide"

Removed all comments with <!-- from html files.

The org.eclipse.birt.doc plugin needs to be tagged appropriately to be included in the build.
*** Bug 171900 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
